__e: Yes, I think this is the moment when discretion is the better part of valour.
It called attention to us at a time when discretion is the most important value we hold.
And if anyone understands the concept of discretion being the better part of valor, that would be you, wouldn't it, Detective?
You gained entry to the castle by stealth and now you must leave in the same way.
Something that further relies on your talent for discretion and your stomach for the less savory.
I went to all this trouble for the sake of discretion... ..and then you allow this to happen.
